personalInfo.bio: Full stack developer with hands-on experience in designing, developing, and optimizing enterprise-grade applications using Java, Spring Boot, React, and SQL. Passionate about delivering reliable and scalable digital solutions.

projects.title: Loan Management System
projects.description: Developed and maintained a modular loan application platform supporting end-to-end workflows, amortization schedules, and IRR calculations for enterprise banking clients.

projects.title: Dynamic PDF Generation Engine
projects.description: Implemented a PDF generation framework using FreeMarker templates and XDocReport to dynamically generate structured reports and financial summaries in Struts 1.x applications.

projects.title: IRR & Amortization Schedule Calculator
projects.description: Built a financial computation module to calculate Internal Rate of Return (IRR), broken periods, moratoriums, and repayment schedules with charge-separate logic and validation reports.

projects.title: HTML-to-PDF Converter (Production-Ready)
projects.description: Developed a headless browser-free PDF generation system replacing Chrome automation with efficient Java-based rendering for high-performance production environments.

projects.title: React Loan Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive React dashboard to visualize loan statuses, repayments, and performance metrics integrated with backend REST APIs.

highlights: Developed and enhanced financial modules including IRR, amortization, and repayment schedule engines.
Created reusable components for dynamic PDF generation using XDocReport and FreeMarker.
Optimized database queries and improved loan data processing efficiency by 30%.
Collaborated cross-functionally with QA and business teams to align with financial compliance and product standards.
Delivered small-scale web applications using Spring Boot and MySQL for local clients.
Integrated REST APIs and payment modules with secure authentication using JWT and cookies.
Gained hands-on experience in full stack delivery and client interaction.
